name: That One Adventure Game
description:
"That One Adventure Game" or TOAG is a short Action-Adventure game about an immortal swordswoman who seeks the "Death Bringer" to remove her curse of immortality. During your journey to the "Death Bringer", you'll encounter enemies who'll hinder your path by pushing you away and knocking you back from your place. (Since you know you're immortal and all). Only through the blade of the "Death Bringer" you'll go back to your original state...

Controls:

  • Movement: A S D/Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space/Up Arrow
  • Interact: K/C
  • Attack: Z/J

Notes:

  • This game was made for the "Devtober" Game Jam and started in the middle of October.  But it is mainly made for us the devs to relearn and practice our game-making skills.
  • No one was hurt during the development of this game (physically that is).
  • We plan to polish this even after the game jam so probably lookout for updates :)
